title: Stuffed Chicken with Rice
summary: Delicious stuffed chicken breasts with a savory rice filling. One serving contains 350 calories, 35g of protein, and 12g of fat. This recipe serves 4. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 50 minutes.
instructions:
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the pasta and cook according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large skillet, heat the butter over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1-2 minutes.
3. Add the white wine and cook for another 1-2 minutes until slightly reduced.
4. Add the thawed cauliflower florets and cook until they are heated through, about 3-4 minutes.
5. Add the cooked pasta, extra virgin olive oil, grated cheese, and scallions to the skillet. Toss to combine.
6. Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes to taste.
7. Serve immediately, garnished with additional cheese and breadcrumbs if desired.

title: Stuffed Peppers
summary: Colorful bell peppers stuffed with a savory filling. One serving contains 300 calories, 25g of protein, and 14g of fat. This recipe serves 4. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 55 minutes.
instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove seeds and membranes. Place the peppers in a baking dish.
3. In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Sauté onions and garlic until softened.
4. Add ground beef to the skillet and cook until browned. Season with salt and black pepper.
5. Stir in cooked rice and tomato sauce. Cook for 5 minutes, allowing flavors to meld.
6. Spoon the beef and rice mixture evenly into the bell peppers. Top with shredded cheese.
7. Cover the baking dish with foil and bake for 30-35 minutes, until peppers are tender.
8. Remove from oven and let cool slightly before serving. Enjoy your stuffed peppers!

title: Creamy Chicken Lasagna
summary: Rich and creamy lasagna made with tender chicken and a cheesy sauce. One serving contains 450 calories, 30g of protein, and 22g of fat. This recipe serves 8. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 70 minutes.
instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
3. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Sauté onions and garlic until softened.
4. Add shredded chicken and spinach to the skillet. Cook until spinach is wilted. Remove from heat.
5. In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour to create a roux. Cook for 1-2 minutes.
6. Gradually whisk in milk, stirring constantly until sauce thickens. Season with salt and black pepper.
7. Remove sauce from heat. Stir in ricotta cheese until well combined.
8. In a large baking dish, layer lasagna noodles, chicken mixture, mozzarella cheese, and sauce. Repeat layers.
9. Sprinkle grated Parmesan cheese on top. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes.
10. Remove foil and bake for an additional 10 minutes, until cheese is bubbly and golden.
11. Let lasagna cool for 10 minutes before serving. Enjoy your creamy chicken lasagna!
